columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Codes that fully specifies the upload organisation.

columns.name: collection_occasion_key
columns.dc:title: Collection Occasion Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each collection occasion of outcome measures. The Collection Occasion Key is unique and stable for each collection occasion at the level of the organisation.

columns.name: measure_date
columns.dc:title: Collection Occasion - Measure Date
columns.schema:description: The date the measure was given.

columns.name: reason_for_collection
columns.dc:title: Collection Occasion - Reason
columns.schema:description: The reason for the collection of the outcome measures on the identified Outcome Collection Occasion.

columns.name: k10p_item1
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 1
columns.schema:description: In the past 4 weeks, about how often did you feel tired out for no good reason?

columns.name: k10p_item2
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 2
columns.schema:description: In the past 4 weeks, about how often did you feel nervous?

columns.name: k10p_item3
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 3
columns.schema:description: In the past 4 weeks, about how often did you feel so nervous that nothing could calm you down?

columns.name: k10p_item4
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 4
columns.schema:description: In the past 4 weeks, how often did you feel hopeless?

columns.name: k10p_item5
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 5
columns.schema:description: In the past 4 weeks, how often did you feel restless or fidgety?

columns.name: k10p_item6
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 6
columns.schema:description: In the past 4 weeks, how often did you feel so restless you could not sit still?

columns.name: k10p_item7
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 7
columns.schema:description: In the past 4 weeks, how often did you feel depressed?

columns.name: k10p_item8
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 8
columns.schema:description: In the past 4 weeks, how often did you feel that everything was an effort?

columns.name: k10p_item9
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 9
columns.schema:description: In the past 4 weeks, how often did you feel so sad that nothing could cheer you up?

columns.name: k10p_item10
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 10
columns.schema:description: In the past 4 weeks, how often did you feel worthless?

columns.name: k10p_item11
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 11
columns.schema:description: In the past four weeks, how many days were you totally unable to work, study or manage your day to day activities because of these feelings?

columns.name: k10p_item12
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 12
columns.schema:description: Aside from those days, in the past four weeks, how many days were you able to work or study or manage your day to day activities, but had to cut down on what you did because of these feelings?

columns.name: k10p_item13
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 13
columns.schema:description: In the past four weeks, how many times have you seen a doctor or any other health professional about these feelings?

columns.name: k10p_item14
columns.dc:title: K10+ - Question 14
columns.schema:description: In the past four weeks, how often have physical health problems been the main cause of these feelings?
